dmca.title: xtragoogle.com - DMCA complaint
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Tu Tsao [mailto:tu@google.com] 
Sent: Thursday, June 23, 2005 1:41 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Tu Tsao
Subject: xtragoogle.com - DMCA complaint

Dear Mr. Poletes,

I am writing on behalf of Google Inc., the owner of the content on
google.com.  We recently learned that a website that your company is hosting
at www.xtragoogle.com contains images and trademarks owned by Google.  The
copying of these images and trademarks is not authorized by Google, and thus
violates Google's copyright and trademark rights. 
We request that you immediately disable the content on this site, as
required by your policy and the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), 17
U.S.C. section 512.

As required by the DMCA, I provide you with the following information:

1.  Copyrighted works:  Google owns the trademark GOOGLE, the Google Search
box (including the "I'm Feeling Lucky" Button), the GMAIL envelope logo, and
the various images as seen on Google's Products Page,
www.google.com/intl/en/options/index.html.

2.  Infringing Material:  Unauthorized copies of the above currently appear
at www.xtragoogle.com

3.  Contact Information:  Please email me using this address or contact me
using the information provided in the signature below.

4.  I have a good faith belief that use of the material noted above is not
authorized by Google, its agents, or the law.

5.  I affirm that the statements I have made above are accurate, and are
made under penalty of perjury.

6.  I affirm that I am authorized to act on behalf of Google, the copyright
owner of the material noted above.

I look forward to hearing your confirmation that you have disabled the
content at www.xtragoogle.com.

Regards,
/Tu Tsao/

-----

Tu Tsao
Trademark Counsel
Google Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Way
Mountain View, CA  94043
Tel:  (650) 253-6654
Fax:  (650) 618-8571
